rules.description: Caps Lock to Hyper (Shift+Command+Option+Control) or Caps Lock (If Alone)

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

to.shell_command: open -a 'Terminal.app'
open -a 'Visual Studio Code.app'
open -a 'Google Chrome.app'
open -a 'Microsoft OneNote.app'
open -a 'Finder.app'
open -a 'Free Download Manager.app'
open -a 'Brave Browser.app'
open -a 'JDownloader2.app'
open -a 'CopyQ.app'
open -a 'Cursor.app'
if ps aux | grep -v grep | grep 'Kap.app' > /dev/null; then osascript -e 'quit app "Kap.app"'; else open -a 'Kap.app'; fi
if ps aux | grep -v grep | grep 'AlDente.app' > /dev/null; then osascript -e 'quit app "AlDente.app"'; else open -a 'AlDente.app'; fi
if ps aux | grep -v grep | grep 'KeepingYouAwake.app' > /dev/null; then osascript -e 'quit app "KeepingYouAwake.app"'; else open -a 'KeepingYouAwake.app'; fi

rules.description: Hyper+i to Open/Close CleanMyMac X Menu

to.shell_command: if pgrep -x 'com.macpaw.CleanMyMac4.Menu' > /dev/null || pgrep -f 'CleanMyMac X Menu' > /dev/null; then osascript -e 'quit app "com.macpaw.CleanMyMac4.Menu"' & osascript -e 'quit app "CleanMyMac X Menu"' & else open -a '/Applications/CleanMyMac X.app/Contents/Library/LoginItems/CleanMyMac X Menu.app'; fi

rules.description: Right Command to Escape if pressed alone
Right Shift to Mouse Middle Click if pressed alone
Left Command to Escape if pressed alone

to.shell_command: for i in $(seq 12); do osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"' -e 'key code 145' -e ' end tell'; done
for i in $(seq 16); do osascript -e 'tell application "System Events"' -e 'key code 144' -e ' end tell'; done

rules.description: Map Command+B to Duplicate Tab in Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Duplicate Tab" of menu "Tab" of menu bar 1 of process "Google Chrome"'

rules.description: Map Command+I to Extensions in Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Extensions" of menu "Window" of menu bar 1 of process "Google Chrome"'

rules.description: Map Command+M to Move Tab to New Window in Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Move Tab to New Window" of menu "Tab" of menu bar 1 of process "Google Chrome"'

rules.description: Map Control+W to Close Tabs to the Right in Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Close Tabs to the Right" of menu "Tab" of menu bar 1 of process "Google Chrome"'

rules.description: Map Control+Q to Close Other Tabs in Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Close Other Tabs" of menu "Tab" of menu bar 1 of process "Google Chrome"'

rules.description: Map Command+R to Rename in Finder

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Rename" of menu "File" of menu bar 1 of process "Finder"'

rules.description: Map Command+R to Rename in Preview

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Preview" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to click menu item "Renameâ€¦" of menu "File" of menu bar 1 of process "Preview"'
DEVICE="b3-95-eb-3d-bc-72"; BIN="/usr/local/bin/blueutil"; if [ "$($BIN --is-connected $DEVICE)" = "1" ]; then $BIN --disconnect $DEVICE; else $BIN --connect $DEVICE; fi

rules.description: Set Chrome Window to Top Left Corner with Hyper+1

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to set screenBounds to bounds of window of desktop' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" to tell window 1 to set {position, size} to {{0, 25}, {(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}}'

rules.description: Set Chrome Window to Top Right Corner with Hyper+2

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to set screenBounds to bounds of window of desktop' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" to tell window 1 to set {position, size} to {{(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, 25}, {(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}}'

rules.description: Set Chrome Window to Bottom Left Corner with Hyper+3

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to set screenBounds to bounds of window of desktop' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" to tell window 1 to set {position, size} to {{0, 25 + (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}, {(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}}'

rules.description: Set Chrome Window to Bottom Right Corner with Hyper+4

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to set screenBounds to bounds of window of desktop' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" to tell window 1 to set {position, size} to {{(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, 25 + (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}, {(item 3 of screenBounds)/2, (item 4 of screenBounds-25)/2}}'

rules.description: Set Chrome Window to Full Screen with Hyper+5

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to set screenBounds to bounds of window of desktop' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" to tell window 1 to set {position, size} to {{0, 25}, {item 3 of screenBounds, item 4 of screenBounds - 25}}'

rules.description: Map Right Shift to Delete Current File in IINA

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "IINA" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "IINA" to click menu item "Delete Current File" of menu "File" of menu bar 1'
